Runtime.Architecture: DDD + Hexagonal; domain/application free of Spring/JPA/transport dependencies.

Database.Rules: Disable Open-Session-in-View; equals/hashCode by business key; optimistic locking with @Version.

Security.Auth: OAuth2/OIDC JWT; BUYER for own orders; INSTALLER for assigned jobs; ADMIN/OPS for overrides; SERVICE for system calls.
Security.Validation: Bean Validation on DTOs; domain invariants for slot conflicts/idempotency.

Observability.Metrics: Micrometer + Prometheus; metrics: slot search latency, booking success/failure, conflict rate.
Observability.Tracing: OpenTelemetry; include orderId and slotId in spans.
Observability.Logging: Structured JSON with block anchors (INSTALL-SLOT-SEARCH/BOOK/UPDATE) for belief-state tracing.

Resilience.Retries: Idempotent booking with retries if needed; circuit breakers for external calls

Testing.Unit: Slot conflict detection and idempotent booking
Testing.Contract: OpenAPI for REST; AsyncAPI/Avro for installation events
Testing.Architecture: ArchUnit enforcing hexagonal boundaries and shared-kernel purity
